narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Jhc Operations, LLC is a Technician, Personal Care Attendant provider based in Mount Vernon, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $98.4M in Medicaid payments across 1.6M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $98.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
